item.title: ~Modcave~ ~more updates to come great code (for now ;))~
item.dc:creator: @Black_pk Black pk
item.description:
@Black_pk wrote:

Diffuculty: 1/3

Search: Wanneshop in client java put these under it:

} else if (NPCID == 457) { //Modcave shop1 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; //ModCave shop1

} else if (NPCID == 1552) { //Modcaveshop2 PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //ModCave shop2

Put these in auto spawns:

// Black pk's Modcave NPC's \\ spawn = 457 2714 9809 0 2718 2714 2711 2714 2 Robe Shop ModsCave spawn = 1552 2719 9808 0 0 0 0 0 1 Mod cave shop owner spawn = 50 2721 9816 0 0 0 0 0 1 modcave monster spawn = 50 2717 9820 0 0 0 0 0 1 modcave monster spawn = 50 2711 9819 0 0 0 0 0 1 modcave monster spawn = 50 2716 9815 0 0 0 0 0 1 modcave monster spawn = 2862 2720 9804 0 0 0 0 0 1 modcave greeter spawn = 2862 2715 9806 0 0 0 0 0 1 modcave greeter //End Of Black pk's Modcave NPC's \\

Goto NPCHandler and find “Moo” and put these under that.

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 2862) { if (misc.random2(32) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to ModsCave!"; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2862) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Hello fellow Modarator/Administrator!"; }

now goto shops.java and add these.

shop = 41@gre@Mod shop 2 2 1050 1000 1052 1000 1048 1000 1046 1000 1044 1000 1042 1000 1040 1038 1000 shop = 2@gre@Mod shop 2 2 2661 1000 2663 1000 2665 1000 2667 1000 3479 1000 2669 1000 2671 1000 2673 1000 2675 1000 3480 1000 2653 1000 2655 1000 2657 1000 2659 1000 2478

and now goto Client.java and put these in commands.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("modcave")) && playerRights >= 1); { teleportToX = 2717; teleportToY = 9801; sendMessage("Welcome to ModsCave"+playerName,); }

Also: If you have to change wanne shops numbers.

Read full topic
